textBox.richText: Member of the biometric team from Jul 2012 to June 2014. PostDoc on 3D face anti-spoofing. Involved in the project TABULA RASA and Swiss Center for Biometrics Research and Testing. Nesli Erdogmus received her degree in Electrical and Electronics Engineering from METU (Ankara, Turkey) in 2005. She continued her education in the same department for M.Sc. Until the completion of her thesis in 2008, she also worked as a research assistant on a TUBITAK project, titled as "3D head model construction by soft/hard tissue modeling via various imaging techniques". She did her Ph.D. research in the Multimedia Communications Department of EURECOM (Sophia Antipolis, France) and received her degree from Telecom ParisTech in 2012.
